message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $12000.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in this product, but I'm only willing to pay $8000 at this time. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I'm willing to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and your interest in it, I propose a price of $9500 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $9500 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to go up to $8500. This is my final offer, as I'm comfortable buying from John for $8000 if we can't reach an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I'm willing to sell the product for $9000. This is my final offer for this round.

Alice, I understand you're trying to get as close to your desired price as possible. While $9000 is a good offer, I'm sticking to my previous offer of $8500. If we can't agree on this, I'll be moving on to John's offer.
Considering the value of the product and your interest, I'm willing to sell it for $8800. This is my final offer for this round.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm willing to go up to $8600 for the product. This is my final offer, as I'm ready to purchase from John if we can't agree.
After careful consideration, I'm willing to sell the product for $8700. This is my final offer for this round.
